name: RGB
description: We're a community driven NFT creation platform. We provide a canvas for the community to create art where each pixel is recorded onto the blockchain. These recorded pixels are then converted into a unique timelapse NFT. Each canvas is run for a certain time limit and then minted into these NFTs. Contributors to the canvas are then rewarded when the NFT is sold. Each pixel drawn gives a percentage share of the NFT sales. Our platform is running now and we've already minted our first NFT!
